node.title: Whincup to adopt trademark 'win it or bin it' attitude in Bathurst 1000 farewell
node.alt: A male supercars driver stands with his hands on his hips in front of his car.
node.description: It what will be his final appearance as a Supercars driver, Jamie Whincup is aiming to conquer the Mount Panorama Circuit for aÂ fifth time to cap off his remarkable career behind the wheel.
node.content:
["This weekend's Bathurst 1000 will be Jamie Whincup's last hurrah as a Supercars driver, drawing to a close one of the most successful careers in the sport.\u00a0", "The 38-year-old has earned legend status in Supercars,\u00a0having claimed a record seven championships, four Bathurst 1000 victories and 124 race wins.", "Whincup said he was\u00a0confident he could\u00a0conquer the Bathurst 1000's\u00a0treacherous Mount Panorama Circuit one more time on Sunday.", "\"This weekend we've got as good an opportunity as ever,\" he said.", "\"I wouldn't be here if we didn't have a chance [to win]. We've just got to be there at the end of six-and-a-half hours.", "\"It'll be the same 'win it or bin it Jamie' that you've seen over the last 10\u00a0years.\u00a0", "Whincup\u00a0is in a league of his own, sitting ahead of five-time Supercars/Australian Touring Car championship winners Mark Skaife, Dick Johnson and Ian Geoghegan.", "His title victories came in 2008, 2009, 2011, 2012,\u00a02013 and 2014 \u2014 the year he claimed the all-time pole position award and a record-breaking sixth championship win \u2014\u00a0and most recently in 2017.", "\"When I made the decision I wanted to retire, I wanted to make sure I finished at my peak and my most competitive,\" Whincup\u00a0said.", "\"Sydney Motorsport Park showed that and the same goes for this weekend. We are going to fight it out and I won't be handing it over to anyone.\"", "
Whincup embracing\u00a0the 'haters'
", "During his almost\u00a0two decades in Supercars, Whincup has not\u00a0attracted the praise or cult-like worship that some of his competitors have enjoyed, such as\u00a0Skaife, Craig Lowndes or Peter Brock.", "That could come down to the fact that he has\u00a0won championships in both a Ford and a Holden, in addition to\u00a0his brash and uncompromising style on the track.", "", "
Whincup with the Supercars\u00a0trophy after his 2017 championshop triumph.(AAP: Darren Pateman)
", "Either way, Whincup relished\u00a0the hostility and said he hoped\u00a0he copped\u00a0as much heat in his farewell race as he had during his accomplished career.", "\"I love the passion of this place (Mount Panorama), it's a crazy place and we love to come here racing,\" he said.", "\"We need both sides, the rivalry and the passion.\u00a0I don't\u00a0want that to stop.", "\"I certainly hope the beloved Ford fans and the haters are still there, that's what makes Bathurst Bathurst.\"", "Whether you're a fan or not, Whincup has to be appreciated for his achievements and unyielding approach to racing.", "\"I don't regret anything, anyone can put on their captain hindsight hat,\" he said.", "\"But standing here right now I feel it is time [to retire]\u00a0and I am looking forward to my last event.\"", "
A lifelong dedication
", "As a seven-year-old, Whincup test drove his first go-kart In 1991, before\u00a0notching up junior and rookie titles as a teenager.", "He won the Senior Formula A Kart Series at age 15 and the Australian Formula Ford Championship as a 19-year-old.", "Whincup's Supercars debut came in 2002 and he graduated\u00a0to become a full-time driver the following year, but was dumped a short time later.", "When he was given a career lifeline by Tasman Motorsport in 2005, he was not\u00a0going to let this opportunity slide and he finished on the podium at the Sandown 500 and the Bathurst 1000.", "Those successes caught the attention of Triple Eight Race Engineering\u00a0and the rest is history.", "", "
Whincup (left) joined Craig Lowndes\u00a0in winning the 2006 Bathurst 1000.(Getty: Robert Cianflone)
", "Racing on the Mount Panorama circuit is the ideal send-off for Whincup.", "\"I normally like to keep it low key at the start of Bathurst week,\" he said.", "\"But I am just blown away by how much effort the team has\u00a0put into my last week.\u00a0They're making it very special for me, I'm proud as punch.", "\"Win, lose or draw, I am going to try and enjoy it as much as I can. I feel very privileged.", "While Whincup\u00a0is stepping out of the full-time driver seat, he is not\u00a0saying goodbye to the sport.", "The 38-year-old is joining Triple\u00a0Eight's\u00a0team management.", "\"I am looking forward to what I call chapter three [of my career],\u00a0which is going to be just as exciting as chapter two,\" he said.", "For the first time in history Bathurst 1000 will conclude this year's Supercars championship, after Covid-19 forced changes to the original\u00a0schedule."]
